price: 99. Until, when death comes to one of them (those who join partners with Allâh), he says: "My Lord! Send me back,
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
